ygData.subject: whiner
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah! As I read your post I can t help but crack up in laughter.  I can t believe how this bothers you SO much!  Do you realize this is only a game? Play your
ygData.messageBody:
Bah! As I read your post I can't help but crack up in laughter. I can't
believe how this bothers you SO much! Do you realize this is only a game?
Play your druid and be happy. Granted, my druid and wizard are not 50 yet
so I can't confirm your remarks....you might be right, but I'll stick to
what I enjoy and play my little wizzie. I thank God I don't work at Verant
where I actually have to read and take responses like yours seriously.

-- Lim'Dul


>I am not sure you know how weak we are.... You tell about dd ? ok. Do >you
>know that your best spel at level 50 only does 625 dommage ???? And >>that
>the
>best dd spel for DRUID is 615 (and they buy it IN A FUCKING SHOP)????
